short_summary: Heavy Equipment and Operator Dundurn Standing Offer
description: Provide heavy equipment and operator services for Department of National Defence (DND) 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, Dundurn Saskatchewan.
full_summary:
================

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**
------------------------------------

### Request Budget

* **Project Title:** Heavy Equipment with Operator Dundurn
* **Reference Number:** WS4220470352
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Revised Tender Closing Date:** January 19, 2024, at 14:00:00 (EST)

### Project Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Standing Offer (SO) from a qualified supplier for the provision of heavy equipment and operator services to support construction, maintenance, repair, and alteration work at 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, Dundurn, Saskatchewan.

**Scope of Work:**
-----------------

The Standing Offer will comprise the provision of

* Labour, materials, tools, equipment, expertise, administration, and supervision
* Servicing, engineering, demolition, and transportation of goods
* Travel time to perform work as required
* Purchase of goods and materials
* Hiring of sub-trades for specific duties

**Submission Requirements:**
---------------------------

Please submit your Standing Offer in accordance with the attached document "Scope of Work" and ensure that all required supporting documentation is included.

**Award Criteria:**
-------------------

The Standing Offer will be awarded based on the lowest price.

**Bidder Information:**
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Person:** Matthew Keenan, PSPC
* **Contact Information:**

Keenan, Matthew (SPAC/PSPC)
Email: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: [______________](# TO BE UPDATED)

### Region

* The work will be performed at 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, Dundurn, Saskatchewan, and surrounding areas.

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18322645?extsite=MTgzMjI2NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Last updated: January 8, 2024
Attachments: N/A



Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31 
Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

Let me know if there were any requirements  not followed as per your instructions. Will correct any issues, thank you!!!.  CMD team
